content.html: Saw that 💩take on pair programming. No it does not “kill velocity”. If one of the pair is a “driver” and the other a “passenger”, then you are doing it all wrong. Once again this is basic shit that a you know who is completely comfortable being loud and wrong about.
content.value:
Saw that 💩take on pair programming.

No it does not “kill velocity”. 

If one of the pair is a “driver” and the other a “passenger”, then you are doing it all wrong.

Once again this is basic shit that a you know who is completely comfortable being loud and wrong about.
